Uses of Class
com.ingenico.direct.CommunicatorBuilder

  • Packages that use CommunicatorBuilder 
    Package Description
    com.ingenico.direct  

    • Uses of CommunicatorBuilder in com.ingenico.direct

      Methods in com.ingenico.direct that return CommunicatorBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CommunicatorBuilder Factory.createCommunicatorBuilder(CommunicatorConfiguration configuration)
      Creates a CommunicatorBuilder based on the passed configuration.
      static CommunicatorBuilder Factory.createCommunicatorBuilder(URI configurationFileUri, String apiKeyId, String secretApiKey)
      Creates a CommunicatorBuilder based on the configuration values in configurationFileUri, apiKeyId and secretApiKey.
      CommunicatorBuilder CommunicatorBuilder.withAPIEndpoint(URI apiEndpoint)
      Sets the Ingenico ePayments platform API endpoint URI to use.
      CommunicatorBuilder CommunicatorBuilder.withAuthenticator(Authenticator authenticator)
      Sets the Authenticator to use.
      CommunicatorBuilder CommunicatorBuilder.withConnection(Connection connection)
      Sets the Connection to use.
      CommunicatorBuilder CommunicatorBuilder.withMarshaller(Marshaller marshaller)
      Sets the Marshaller to use.
      CommunicatorBuilder CommunicatorBuilder.withMetaDataProvider(MetaDataProvider metaDataProvider)
      Sets the MetaDataProvider to use.
